website_summaries.verdict: Minerals and oil infuse skin and cleanse on the spot and improving overall texture.
pros: Contains aloe vera, vitamin A, sunflower seed, and other herbs
High marks for this product's ability to relieve clogged pores
Works well for all skin types
Can be used by both men and women
Easy to wash off, revealing clear smooth skin
cons: Be sure to sample product first to ensure it doesn't react with your skin

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Leaves my face feeling smooth and my pores much smaller. Doesn’t dry out your skin either. Also I have very sensitive skin and there hasn’t been any irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Shocked!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not joking, I thought this was just going to be a normal face mask but I was wrong. The application was smooth and easy. After waiting 10 minutes, I took it off and....my face was smooth as a baby's buttcheek, no lie. This made my face so soft and feeling refreshed and hydrated!!!
customer_reviews.author: olesya gordeyeva

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I never type reviews but this mask had me in tears. It broke my face out so horribly. Big and painful, deep cystic zits. I know they say that masks like these are suppose to "purge your skin," but I feel as though this caused problems that were not there. I typically have combination to sensitive skin, with the occasional breakout every time of the month. I normally use the Origins mud mask, but wanted to try something new. This was just not for me, so beware!
customer_reviews.author: tyler kennon

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome mask, best for acne prone skin. Leaves your face feeling clean and moisturized. Great for males or females you'll love it! It's just amazing that's it. Anybody interested in buying should 😊
customer_reviews.author: kellz

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! My daughter call it "The Magic Mask". You can really tell the difference after the first application.
customer_reviews.author: Yunuhe

customer_reviews.title: Have you been dealing with cystic acne? Do you want soft skin? THIS IS THE PRODUCT TO BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite face mask. After getting on birth control, I’ve recently been having terrible cystic acne. I tried every single product I could possibly find. THIS face mask was the ultimate addition to my self care and skincare routine. This mask makes your skin feel super soft and goes on so smoothly. A little goes a long way. I use this product at least once a week to help with my acne and I have barely made a dent in it after two months of owning. If you’re looking for “the review the makes you buy”, here it is. I recommend this to everyone I know. ***EDITED TO ADD BEFORE AND AFTER PICTURES***
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Cole

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this mask! Gets deep in your pores and leaves your skin feeling refreshed!!
customer_reviews.author: mrsmilleratx

customer_reviews.title: And I'm totally in love. Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a few weeks ago. And I'm totally in love. Fast Delivery. Quality product. I love how looks my face after... reducing pores, minimize acne, clarifying, and leaves the skin smooth. I use it two times at week. Definitely I will buy this product again and definitely I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mar O.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Worked right away. Skin got cleaner and better. Acne went mild after using this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not true to description
customer_reviews.text: Said it was for sensitive skin but i used it after gently washing my face and even tried after moisturizing and not washing my face at all and it made my skin burn and itch.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiden dice

customer_reviews.title: Confused as to why there are different ingredients listed for the product received.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people are getting different versions. For instance a few posted getting one that has fewer and better ingredients as opposed to mine that starts off with potato starch, water and corn starch😬 Be careful! I’m not sure I want to use it after noticing this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: sucks !
customer_reviews.text: i read SO MANY good reviews on this mask & i have no idea what anyone is talking about. this mask has done NOTHING to improve my skin or make my skin look better. my face isn’t “so smooth” after using. it def isn’t a “pore minimizer“ i feel like the masks from dollar general work way better. i honestly can’t even say one thing good about this mask. does nothing for my combination skin or pores. not even slightly. total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! I can actually see it helping my pores and fighting my acne when it is on my face! incredible! I use it about once a week, and am so glad for it. It is smooth and easy to apply and easy to remove with only warm water!
customer_reviews.author: Kate the Great

customer_reviews.title: Not for pimples or stress rash or blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I applied it probably total of 3 times but saw no change my stress rash I had is just slowly going away but my blackheads still remain not worth the money u would rather buy the proactive mask for quick over night results!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: Broke my skin out after first use. I gave it to a friend for her to try. I have sensitive combination skin, fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WONDERS OVER NIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: My face was starting to break out all of a sudden, I had tried other mud masks and the charcoal masks, but none of them really seemed to make a difference. I used this mask last night for the first time, and my face has miraculously pretty much cleared up!! I still had some larger red bumps on my face last night when i put the mask on, and before putting the mask on I had also picked at a few.... but it left my skin super soft and really helped the blemishes that I had! This morning, bumps are gone and there are no red spots at all! Will definitely recommend to friends and family!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline P.

customer_reviews.title: My acne grew bright red after using
customer_reviews.text: I used this a few times and my cheek acne, broke out, bright red. I should have gone with the charcoal kind. This stuff is garbage. DHC has a green mask, that fixed this, so sticking with theirs now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: My pores also appeared much cleaner and felt better. I will advise though if you have extremely ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this twice since I got it, and while it can feel slightly unpleasant during use the results afterward were extremely noticeable! My face was extremely soft to the point it was unreal! My pores also appeared much cleaner and felt better. I will advise though if you have extremely sensitive skin you may not find this too easy to enjoy using as like I said it can be rather uncomfortable while using. (But so worth it in the end!)
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: fake
customer_reviews.text: why this from israel???????? its not writen in back, but when i receive it it writen from israel... its not acceptble...
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Almutawa

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mud-based mask to help DECREASE the oil on my skin and this one does exactly the opposite! It's soo oily that my skin felt dirtier after trying this mask not to mention the sting and burn the whole time it was on my face. I gave them 2 stars because it smells nice and the ingredients seem to be legit but definitely not suitable for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anahita J

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it works yet. But I do know it get every where and stains
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Halterman

customer_reviews.title: I am a guy and I love this
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the price. You only need very little but this gets rid of my blackheads like nothing has every been able to before. I love this and would highly recommend it to anyone with problem blackheads that have been proving stubborn. I hope that it will completely clear my skin with a few more uses. Even though it didn't immediately clear my skin completely, it did more in a few minutes than anything in years.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: INFERIOR PRODUCT NOT INGREDIENTS LISTED
customer_reviews.text: Should have read other reviews before purchasing, ingredients are not what’s listed, first three ingredients are potato starch, corn starch and water.
customer_reviews.author: Liz McManus

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: I'm so diapointed, after using within an hour my face began to itch and is covered with bumps all over. I have pretty clear skin and now it is red and blotchy with small bumps. I took Benadryl right away, apparently having an allergic reaction. I'm writing a review to hopefully save someone else's from this happening. I'm 56 years old and have never had this happen before. I have a call in to my dermatologist, the itching and bumps have not gone away and it's been 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliating mask
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a mask before. My teen son wanted a mask so I got this one - he gets these ideas from YouTube. However, I tried it and really enjoyed it. You have to rub it off - not wash it off - to get the benefits. Apply a thin, consistent grey layer that leaves no skin showing. It really does make my skin feel very soft and smooth. I have sensitive skin and have seen no issues whatsoever. My son and I use it about once a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I have extremely dry skin that flakes up at the end of each day even after I apply moisturizer. This product somehow leaves my skin feeling super smooth and incredibly soft even hours after using it. It’s very easy to remove unlike most mud masks. All you need is a little water and it comes right off, so no fussing and scrubbing for 10 minutes! It seems gentle enough to use every day though I use it maybe twice per week. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized so there’s often no need for me to add a separate moisturizer after. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Customer A

customer_reviews.title: Having actually been in the Dead Sea, I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Having actually been in the Dead Sea, I can safely say that this face mask was a close second to that experience.
customer_reviews.author: Faust

customer_reviews.title: It burns. It hurt. And I can't be refunded
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive skin, but as soon as I put the mask on it started to burn. I hate leaving a bad review but after all the pain I had with it on I just couldn't stand the entire 10 minuets. I gave it 6 minutes before I washed and cleaned my face and put on a soothing sheet mask to calm the red down. I even put some on the inside of my elbow just to be sure it wouldn't hurt. The Aztec face mask will remain my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I have weird skin, it’s oily but dry and I break out if I even think about a blemish - super sensitive to products too! I use this two days a week after I wash and get the residual dirt off with toner and cotton. I can feel it tingle but not burning so I know it’s working it’s magic. Once I rinse, my skin feels softer and looks brighter. I keep it in my beauty refrigerator so it’s nice and cool when I spread on. Adding this to my beauty routine has allowed me to cancel maintenance facials, saving me a lot of money. The smell is pleasant as well-I will for sure order again!
customer_reviews.author: DivaD

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't over dry, actually helps to dry up painful acne spots
customer_reviews.text: I hope my opinion stays the same over time but I'm writing a review after my first day trying it because I can't believe how much it did. I've been having a lot of trouble with acne wearing PPE masks at work all day and this skin treatment is the first I've found to actually help clear it up. Obviously my acne isn't instantly gone overnight but the cystic acne spots are less inflamed and no longer painful and that's more than I can say for any other product I've tried recently. So thankful to find something that works and is so inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a No for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product 4 times. Each time I've used it, it tingled and was slightly uncomfortable. But nothing too bad to make me chicken out and quit altogether. The fourth time that I used it, 3 painful burns appeared on my face. They are sensitive, irritated, and painful. I hope these go away soon, but I doubt it. They look worst in person.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this product - it’ll last you forever
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this product is refreshing and not irritating on mine! I tried it a few years ago at a friends and absolutely loved it. Found this one on here in 2018 and bought immediately. I still have tons left and it’s been about a year! With that being said, it really doesn’t take a lot to get the job done. It’s very easy to spread and it’s easy to take off! Really makes your skin smooth once it’s off!
customer_reviews.author: Crimsyn Hawk

customer_reviews.title: SOLD! Buy this, it's great, and you deserve it.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Maybe it was just in my head, but the very first time I used it my complexion seemed brighter, smoother. I suddenly didn't look as tired as I felt, and it was an overall delightful experience. Smooth, consistent texture, easy to spread, jar seems like it'll last me a year at least. It's even a fun color, I love surprising myself when I forget it's on and I pass a mirror. I've used it 3 times now and intend to continue the routine twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is nice. Makes my face feel smooth and soft. But, to be perfectly honest, I don't find it to be much better than the $3 Queen Helene Mint Julep Masque I had been using. I use it for acne, and I like that it dries my face up a bit, shrinks pores, and helps heal acne breakouts. This Dead Sea Mud Mask doesn't do any better, so for me, it's not worth the price tag. But it's still good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ms kimba

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've ever put on my face!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best skin care product I've ever purchased for my face! I've struggled with blackheads, acne, oily skin, folliculitis and just overall yucky skin. I've tried a million things from sacylic acid, benzoyl peroxide, retinA, along with several types of masks and professional facials. THIS actually works better than anything I've ever tried. The only downside is that it doesn't come with an applicator so I purchased some jumbo popsicle sticks that are normally used for applying hair removal wax. This dead sea mask seems to shrink and heal acne quickly, reduces inflammation and redness, and leaves skin feeling clean and smooth. I have this permanently added into my Amazon wishlist for frequent buying lol.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyM

customer_reviews.title: not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Yes, your skin feels nice and smooth period. Does not shrink pores, at least mine. I have large pores and I bought the mask thinking it had good reviews why not. It is easy to apply, yes it drys fast, and yes it leaves your skin very smooth but it did nothing for my pores. I used it for 2 a week. My skin if any is a little more oily now.
customer_reviews.author: romanticatheart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mud Mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mud Mask. It’s easy to apply and it really does a fantastic job of exfoliating, leaving your skin feeling supple and not dried out. And it seems to really help reduce large pores but I need to evaluate the pore reduction after using the product longer. It also has a pleasant scent and not overpowering. Highly recommend — it works and it is a good value overall!
customer_reviews.author: Hawkmoon 269

customer_reviews.title: main 2 ingredients are POTATO STARCH & CORN STARCH.
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s mislabeled as “mud” when the main 2 ingredients are POTATO STARCH & CORN STARCH. It feels clogging on my sensitive skin and my cheek area feels slight burning sensation from the chemical. Also during spreading the mask into my face, I noticed that there’s a chunk of dye or ink that give it that color. I feel like when you started adding color, it just beat the purpose of being natural. I wouldn’t recommend it base on that and I have a beauty membership that sends me all different kinds of facemask and certainly I’ve had much much better.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Sodik

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: WASTE OF MONEY. Company messaged me to take down my review in exchange for a $40 Amazon gift card or PayPal credit. The product is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Broylz

customer_reviews.title: Nice friends share great products. You're welcome
customer_reviews.text: Know that friend with the great skin, who is two mos younger, but looks two years younger? She's using this. How do I know? Because she recommended it. I apply with a brush so I don't put my germy fingers in the jar. It takes a smidge bit of effort to get enough to spread on, because it's thick, but most masks are. It spreads nicely, it doesn't come out of light colored washcloths (use a dark one for sure-yellow isn't dark, btw). It leaves a bit of a tingle, but not in a burning way-more of a "wow, I feel super clean!" way. Thanks, friend, for sharing your secret!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m definitely SOLD on this mask!
customer_reviews.text: Starting off I wasn’t too sure due to feeling slight burning and wanted to rinse it off right away but glad I hung in there wanting to give it a try. After a weeks use, my skin never felt so smooth and had a glow up like no other. I have been suffering from breakouts for some time now and dealing with horrible closed comedones which are not easy to get rid of. However, using the mask has been a blessing using it 3x’s a week and allowing it to dry before I rinse it off. This will be my go to from now on whether I suffer from breakouts or not!
customer_reviews.author: bsexy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing has happened... so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it 3 times in a week and have not seen any change, just my regular face, same pores, same acne... it does burn a little when you apply it, if you have a fan blowing in your face it doesn't sting that much... will try a couple more times, but so far absolutely no results. I decided to write this because I read many reviews calling it "magic", "miracle", etc after their first application... it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This Dead Sea mask is saving me time and money! It honestly does work! At first, I was a bit skeptical. I’ve tried many others throughout the years within minimal to no results of improvements to my Sensitive/oily skin. During the warmer months, I breakout reasonably quickly, especially since I run outdoor and hike a lot. This mask deep cleans so incredibly well, in my opinion. I use the mark about two to three times a week. If you're exhausted from shopping around for the perfect mud mask. I frankly do believe we have a victor here, you all!
customer_reviews.author: 18Scorpii

customer_reviews.title: Cleans it does not dry out your skin
customer_reviews.text: I read all reviews now And I am still a little skeptical about buying products This product is great doesn't scratch my skin it actually cleans noticing A deeper clean without drying out my skin Compared to the other ones at scratch or My skin gets greasy and a few hours this does not happen with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. It does not burn when you apply it to your face, it's easy to wash off, and my skin feels so much better after having using it! The instructions don't say to moisten your face before application, but I like to wash my face before applying it because I feel like my face is cleaner. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage product. Main ingredient is CORN STARCH. Doesn't dry on face. Doesn't work at all, stay away!
customer_reviews.author: ASL

customer_reviews.title: Great for blackheads and weekly facial cleanse
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my skin! I have a problem with blackheads, and this in combination with drinking more water has worked miracles! I have combination/sensitive skin, and while my face can burn and tingle for the first few moments of applying this and is a little red afterwards, redness disappears soon after and I haven't had any negative breakouts on my skin afterwards. Make sure that you don't leave the mask on for longer than 10 minutes (if the mask doesn't try by then, trying applying a thinner layer). An added bonus - this mask smells lovely and reminds me of the spa.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Ko

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredients...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely my fault for not checking ingredients before buying...the first listed ingredient is potato starch! Not exactly the mud mask I was hoping it would be. The scent is sharp and kind of "manly" smelling which isn't bad, but I try to avoid scented skin products per dermatologist recommendations. I used it once without any issue but threw the container away during a bathroom deep clean because I was put off by the ingredients and scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope. No good.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a mask that had Vitamin A in it, bought this mask for the good reviews and the fact it has Vitamin A as described, once I got the bottle, opened it up, used it, then read the back to see details on how long to leave it on and noticed that I didn’t see vitamin A instead vitamin E. Now I can’t return it because I opened the bottle. Horrible mistake by this company for misleading someone looking for something specific. (As seen in photo in red)
customer_reviews.author: Nohara oshana

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! It works wonders! I use it every now and then & it leaves my skin feeling baby smooth following the day after use! It also helps minimize my acne and i’ve noticed it de-puffs my face which I like a lot because it kinda makes me look a little slimmer! Some days my face is more bloated than others because of my diet and lack of sleep so there’s not much I can do about that but this helps de-puff it. I typically use this mask before special events when I need my skin and face to be radiant but I’ll occasionally use it for my own benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin approved! Only average results.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting an earthy smell from this, but it smells very similar to other “anti-aging” products that I own. I have rather sensitive skin, and I will warn you that the mask burned a little when it was on my clean face; But the nice part is it didn’t leave me with a negative reaction. So I approve. For me, it did a nice job at minimizing my pores. But it didn’t do much for my blackheads/problem areas. I would recommend using this for special occasions or with friends! But wouldn’t find it necessary in a weekly routine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Really works. Just have to use a few times to show results! Worked on my blackheads//whiteheads. Brings blemishes to the surface. So it gets worse before it gets better. Have patience!
customer_reviews.author: mags25

customer_reviews.title: Wow - best mask I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a mask addict. This one had great reviews, so I wanted to try it. Wow. within seconds of applying it, a wonderful soothing feeling came over my face. Seriously. No burn, but you can actually feel it doing something. Like a cooling effect. It has an earthy fragrance. Not good or bad, but definitely not perfume-like. Rinses off reasonably well. Skin was so soft and smooth after. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: I don't really know if this is moisturizing. That's why I bought moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice to being pretty. But this stuff seems to have helped (in addition to a few other products) in reducing my acne and blackheads. Keeping my pores cleaner than they have probably ever been. Since I'm a dude I'm really not sure if I'm using this stuff correctly but once it starts to tingle on my face I usually begin the removal process. My face looks, feels, and smells much better ;) My girlfriend thinks I'm more of a girl than her when I use this stuff. "Sorry babe, I'm just trying to be beautiful like you."
customer_reviews.author: Ryandidntdoit

customer_reviews.title: great for eczema or dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I had a pacth of eczema on my face for over half a year I could not resolve. After a trip to the blue lagoon in iceland, the mud mask they provided cleared up my eczema. However it returned after a week or two. i bought this mudmask hoping it would have the same effect adn it did !!! I use it on my boyfriends eczema pacthes on his elbows and knees/shins as well. HIGHLY recommended!! and it does a great job making your non eczema skin soft and clear as well
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. Quartuccio

customer_reviews.title: immediately soothing!
customer_reviews.text: the very first thing that struck me was how cute this container is. maybe that's just me... but then the SMELL! so nice. using the mud, the soothing feel of the clay in immediately relieving, and shortly after application you can kind of feel the mud sinking in and doing its job to bust up junk! my cheeks and nose are healing up from chronic blackheads already. its easily rinsed off, no scrubbing needed! will definitely purchase this mud again. curious about other products
customer_reviews.author: briemarz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This dead sea mud mask is absolutely incredible! I was hoping this would help clear out my pores and provide a deep clean to my face and it did! This product applied very smoothly and it smelled very good and not overpowering. It came off very easily with some warm water and following the directions on the jar. Great mask absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Minah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. I use it only once a week myself but that is due to using other products in conjunction. Either way, it leaves my skin soft and feeling great. I enjoy applying the product as well and utilize a brush to do so because its easiest to get it applied all over. Drys nicely and doesn't sting or pull, really is a smooth process and removing the mask is super easy. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Eczema friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have Eczema (inflammation of the skin). There's not that many skin products out there that is suitable for me to use. Even the ones labeled specifically for Eczema would irritate my skin. So i was surprised that this Dead Sea Mud Mask works well for me and does not cause irritation to my face. I have just finished my first bottle. Each application makes my skin feels silky smooth and fresh, but as for reducing pores, I am not sure if it works or not. I can't really tell.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Tsen

customer_reviews.title: Clearer Skin
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is thick and easy to apply. It has a mild fragrance, not too strong, but definitely has a smell to it. I like to apply it and let it dry before getting into the shower to rinse it off (but don’t rinse your face with super hot water, it can break blood vessels.) It did stain a towel when I rubbed it off, so use one you don’t mind getting grey smudges all over. Effectively reduced redness and pimple puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bonneau

customer_reviews.title: The change in my skin texture is unreal
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy, I have genuinely oily skin and rosy cheeks comprising my face, my cheeks are pretty rough even after a solid shave. This stuff made a ridiculous difference in the texture of my skin. My skin went from rough and patchy/rosy to a baby’s skin level of smooth with a more blended more pink hue on my cheeks. Pretty trippy but pretty awesome as well. I have sensitive skin prone to breakouts and this has also wiped out my face acne too. I’ll usually do a face shave followed by this face mask then a retinol cream. It will work wonders for you skin, seriously
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this any stars. This product has really made my skin worse. I have had breakouts and the black spots are like never before. The last pic is two weeks before I started using this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Detox Mask for a Spa Moment
customer_reviews.text: Deep cleans, feels great, smells refreshing and leaves skin looking noticeably cleaner at a fraction of the price of name brand masks. The only down side is that I tend to get breakouts the days following using this. This may be due to the fact that I already have dry skin and this may cause additional dryness, so I'm careful to only use it sparingly and not to leave it on longer than the recommended time. Overall, I'd buy it again and recommend it for what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: WordWoman31

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, soft skin
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask is exactly what I was looking for. The product is also tightly packed into the container and is not messy when using - like a clay texture instead of a liquid mud texture which is nice. Easy to spread on skin. Leave on for at least 10 minutes and wash off with warm water. My skin feels so smooth and soft after my first use. Have a feeling this container will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: NaeNae

customer_reviews.title: Love the mud!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about ordering this, but I thought why not give it a try! I’m used to used to Mary Kay and L’BRI, and I must say I like this better then any other mask ever! The only negative I found is it discolored my cream colored wash rags, so I have to either get a darker color wash rag or I will use the same one. Otherwise I love how my skin feels after...I don’t have blemishes or anything but I still love how my sk8n feels after, just so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Tootsaroni

customer_reviews.title: Made Me Breakout* thankful for return policy
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT "Help Treat Acne, Blackheads & Oily Skin." (I have all three, not much acne though, unless I eat a lot of junk food) The mask caused me to break out with large pimples deep under the skin. I was very excited to try this but unfortunately it made me break out. I know everyone's skin is different so I did give 2 stars instead of 1. Also grateful for the extended return policy during the COVID-19 Pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Soft as eggs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting this mud mask for a while and decided to finally get it. It is true, your skin will feel very soft from the very first time you rinse it off of your face! I can have oily skin and after rinsing it off not only was it super soft but it had a matte finish and I had no need to apply lotion/moisturizer. I am looking forward to using this more often and get rid of some black heads 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and used it right after my shower so my pores were nice & open! It is sooo easy to spread, a little goes a long way, and it has a slightly tingly feeling to it. Left my skin so soft and bright. Shipping is incredibly fast, too. So happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: taylor perdue

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleanse, devoted user
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mask for more than three years. While it is somewhat annoying to wash off, I feel that it is truly a deep cleanse that my face really needs. I don’t have a skincare regimen, but I like to do this mask 2 or 3 times a month. I really notice a difference in the days after. Also, as the mask dries, you can actually see nastiness being drawn out of your pores if you have any active pimples. Pretty gross and cool! Inexpensive, lasts a long time, and a quality mask. Make sure to follow with moisturizer, it is very drying!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year and just loved it! It’s one of my favorite skin care products now. I reordered it last week and noticed that several scents are available. I ordered the “original” version thinking it’s the version I had before. Either the formulation has changed or I was sent the lavender version because the mask has a green-ish hue now and it smells strongly of lavender. I can’t return it because I already opened it and I can’t use it because the smell is so overpowering and unpleasant. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I will order this again! While it did not shrink my pores as much as I was hoping (I have LARGE pores), it did make a noticeable difference for me using twice a week. I use the product as directed on my oily areas; T zone, cheeks and chin. I can go all day now with minimal shine on hot days; I was having to use a oil absorbing sheet once or twice a day. It did over dry the skin area on either sides of my mouth so I just don't put it there. Using twice a week this container seems like it is going to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene White

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product - skin incredibly soft and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted to create an at-home spa day since we can't go to a spa now during Covid-19, so I bought this and we absolutely love it! Applied so smoothly over our skin (we used it all over, not just face), dried nicely and then showered to wash off. Our skin was so smooth and soft - like I used a loofah but nothing harsh about this mud! We love it and I will keep buying plus give as gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: yin yang goddess

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING IVE EVER PUT ON MY FACE
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and combination skin combined with hyper sensitivity. It’s incredibly hard to fine something that DEEP CLEANS my SENSITIVE skin without causing it to feel stripped. This stuff did it all. Exfoliated, brightened, detoxed, refined my pores, and left my face feeling like butter and so smooth. I’m a nanny so I can assure you, MY FACE IS SOFTER THAN A BABYS BOTTOM. The application was super smooth and spreads easy. It dries like powdery soft, but not loose powder. It came off super easy with a warm wash rag.
customer_reviews.author: s.g.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My face is normally VERY sensitive when it comes to facial cleansers (usually after using them I break out or have skin irritations), however, not with this face mask. At times it does feel like it’s burning/tingling (maybe because I leave it on a little longer than recommended) but after I rinse it off my skin is extra soft and bright. And the best part is....Absolutely No irritation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few weeks ago and have been using it once or twice a week. I can definitely see my skin is looking clearer and more even since starting to use this mask. I usually apply this and let it dry before getting a shower because it’s the easiest way to remove the mask. A little goes a long way, Especially with the silicon brushes because they allow you to get an even thin layer. It can be a bit drying, so definitely moisturize after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my large pores basically disappear
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this mud mask for the first time after seeing it for a while. I don’t know what took me so long!!! It’s much better than my pricier Dirty Girl PUR mask which gets itchy if I touch my face with it still on. But this mud mask is much better! It’s so smooth and easy to apply, doesn’t make my face itch at all and my larger pores on my nose and sides of my nose have been greatly reduced I could hardly see them in the mirror anymore. I’m really impressed and for the price it is such a great deal. I high recommend it if you want a good mud mask.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: YAAAS QUEEN!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this product! Not only is it purely authentic mud from the Dead Sea (my all-time fav kind of masque!), it’s perfect for ROSACEA! Of course you still have to consult your doctor, as skin and conditions differ from one person to another, but it worked perfectly for me... as well as my pores! Will most definitely order this again, and the “healing clay” one too Insha’Allah! Thanks, New York Biology! 💋💋
customer_reviews.author: Lujain

customer_reviews.title: Not much clay
customer_reviews.text: The first three ingredients in this mask are potato starch, water, and corn starch. Then comes kaolin, a clay, but not from the Dead Sea. You have to get low in the ingredient list before you find Dead Sea clay. Even the cheapest clay masks are still mostly clay. When I purchase a clay mask, I expect to get a clay mask, not one that is mostly potato and corn starch.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: It does STING!
customer_reviews.text: I applied the product to my face for the first time today. The jar itself was distorted and was not very professional looking, so that definitely was not a first good impression. Application was very easy, and after the mask, my pores did appear smaller; my skin was also smoother. My sensitive areas are around my lips and let me tell you, it did STING for about 2 minutes. However, it isn't that bad. I have very deep acne scars and lots of blackheads. I will keep using this product for 3 months and will give a actual rating and review then. For now, it's like any decent mask.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This masks feels very nice and calming on my skin. I have dry sensitive skin, so some masks are really not for me, but this masks feels great! It smells like lavender too, which is one of my favorite scents! My sister tried it with me and she really liked it too! My face felt so smooth and my pores appeared to have shrunk slightly! I hope that with continual use that this will almost eliminate them! I've used it twice now and the results from the second time were even better! I will defiantly be buying more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: MissAshums

customer_reviews.title: Deep Skin Mask - it left my skin kind of oily.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 27 years old, African American, with pretty normal skin (not naturally dry or oily) I used this mask at least once or twice a week in the beginning just to try it out consistently. Since the first use, I noticed that it left my skin more oily. I personally like mask or deep cleanses that feels like I “stripped the dirt or oil away”. I love the open pours, fresh face feel and appearance. This product didn’t give me that. I’m not saying that it’s bad, but it just didn’t work for me and what I was exactly looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but it was just ok. No real complaints, but didn’t see any drastic changes while using this product. It also didn’t leave my face feeling clean and refreshed like other masks do. It did not irritate or dry out my skin. I used the original scent which reminded me of bubbles when i was younger, so not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: Usually im very skeptical of Amazon reviews because 9/10 times its all fake and a bunch of bs. THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING. It smells great, easy to apply, and ive only used it once so far but after applied my skin felt a little tingle but it wasn't overpowering and I left it on for the recommended 10 minutes. It was quite messy to wash off but once it was off my skin felt brand new. Cleaner than ever. New skin who dis. I stand by this product. I'm never motivated to leave reviews for products but this absolutely deserves one.
customer_reviews.author: John Pazienza

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have any skin benefits
customer_reviews.text: My skin isn't oily or dry. I didn't really get a deep cleaning feel from this product. It's a super gentle exfoliant at best. It makes me break out on my face for some reason . So it didn't really help me at all. My boyfriend has oily skin and I use it on him now and he says it's okay so...neither of us have experienced any skin benefits since using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby H.

customer_reviews.title: Kiss those pores GOODBYE!
customer_reviews.text: Now that masks are required everywhere, my skin has been much more oily and porous. Not to mention, all the oil AND sweat is a sweetspot for acne and pimples. The FIRST application shrunk my nose pores so much! I could see the sebum and oil being sucked out of my nose when the mask was drying up on my face. I didn’t break out and my skin felt great. I’m going to try using this on my keratosis pilaris (arms) and my acne-prone back!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin!
customer_reviews.text: So pros: gentle on skin, smells great, skin was very soft and skin was visibly different Cons: Feels un-natural, definitely feels over processed, doesn't seem to deeply penetrate pores. Overall it was kind to my skin and I will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Moni99

customer_reviews.title: I noticed nothing
customer_reviews.text: I use this mud mask and there not a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's a must have for me! Calms my acne-prone skin like none of the other masks I've used in the past, and doesn't dry my face out. Easy to apply and easy to remove with warm water afterwards. Not a very strong or unpleasant smell either, so that's a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This product helps dry out my acne and reduces the size of my pores. It feels really nice on my face and washes off easily. I put this on after showering, leave it on until it's fairly dry, and then wash it off with a soft wash cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn N.

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is perfect. I usually do it once a week, after I rinse it off my skin immediately feels so soft. The next day my face usually breaks out a little bit which is normal it’s your skin purging. The next day everything is gone and my skin looks amazing. My face was breaking out so bad in the summer then I started using this and I’ll never use another face mask besides this
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: very pleasant experience, leaving skin clean and firm.
customer_reviews.text: The Lavender scent makes the whole experience so calming and refreshing. I just used it for the first time and the only thing i would do differently next time is to apply thinning layer, to let it really dry within 10 min instructed time if it does dry at all. Other than the feel of slight pastiness during the wash off, likely due to thicker application, I think this mask would be something i add to my regular skincare routine for my acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pro1073

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is a simple as apply, wait 10 minutes and rinse. The first time I used the product I noticed the difference. My skin seemed vibrant and alive. I apply the mud mask twice a week and you get a great bang of for the buck. Only draw back is that you need to keep the container away from sunlight and heat sources as it can become liquefied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PAY ATTENTION TO THE EXPIRATION DATE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product January 2019 and as I was using the product recently I noticed that my face started to burn (July 2019) so I looked on the bottom of the can and noticed that the expiration date was March 2019 so how am I supposed to finish this whole can in two months like really!!!!!! it’s a good product and it does work but I’m very disappointed !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: royster

customer_reviews.title: Works like I hoped it would!
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with my sensitive skin during the winter months, and I needed something that would give a deep clean but not completely strip my skin. I've used the product 3x now over the course of 2 weeks and I love it. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mud mask, I've never had anything quite like it. My face feels so fresh and clean and free. It applies very smoothly as well, I also enjoy the smell, I noticed my pores appeared smaller as well. This is a must have in your weekly skincare routine, I'd recommend not using everyday because it can dry your skin out slightly like most masks. But this is a perfect mud mask and one of the best I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep an open mind
customer_reviews.text: The mask smells great! I don’t normally write reviews but this time I think i should. A mud mask brings out all the “dirt” up to the surface so if you break out after using it, its completely normal. There is a lot in it so if you use it right it should last for more than five months. The price is worth it and the quality is great! I’m loving it. The only reason I put 4 stars and not 5 is because “sensitive skin” is so individual. Just try it. More than once. See that incase you break out its because the mud brings out all the dirt and impurities.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed for this product on amazon are false. You might as well mix potato starch and corn starch with lavender oil at home and save $15.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Bilderback

customer_reviews.title: I'd highly recommend, however you should know that this will stain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always had oily skin, particularly my face. I put this on when I take my shower, and my skin is oil free and fresh all day long. I'd highly recommend, however you should know that this will stain counters and towels very easily. Ensure that you remove it all from your face before drying — its best to use this with your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Riddle

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!! My skin is mix the (T ) zone is oily and the rest is kind of dry and after i used this mask my whole face feels like a baby’s behind. I also put it on my mother in-law and her face is very sensitive and she came out with the same results. Worth the money! I will be researching other products from this seller. 👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Claire P.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Okay this mask is incredible. its feels great and cool putting it on and even better when you wash it off. My skin feels like i did a serious scrub and got all the dirt and oil out of it with any actual scrubbing! Highly recommend! and also get a good lotion for after for the extra glow :)
customer_reviews.author: Octavian

product_meta.title: New York Biology Dead Sea Mud Mask for Face and Body - Natural Spa Quality Pore Reducer for Acne, Blackheads and Oily Skin - Tightens Skin for A Healthier Complexion - 8.8 oz…
product_meta.description:
Scent Name:Original New York Biology Dead Sea Mud Mask is the Ultimate Mineral-Infused, Spa Quality Mud on the Market!! 

If You Are Looking for a treatment that Tightens Your Skin Leaving You with a Healthy Looking Glow, Look no Further!! 

Noted for its high concentration of sodium and magnesium, mud from the Dead Sea is highly effective against blackheads and other blemishes. It helps draws out oils and toxins, cleans pores, and may leave your face feeling exfoliated, nourished and clean. Our amazing all natural mud works for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, combination, sensitive, and irritated. 

Benefits of our Dead Sea Mud Mask: 

Reduces, Cleans & Minimizes Pores 

Help Treat Acne , Blackheads & Oily Skin 

Tightens Skin for a Visibly Healthier & Smoother Complexion 

Removes Dead Skin Cells 

100% Natural derived from the Dead Sea in Israel 

Apply to your skin as recommended, and before you know it, your skin will begin to appear firmer ant tighter, leaving you looking years younger.
feature_bullets: DEAD SEA MUD works for all skin types, including dry, normal, oily, combination, sensitive, and irritated. This daily acne treatment has been designed to be highly effective yet gentle enough for everyday use.

MINERAL-INFUSED Clarifying Mud Mask is based on an advanced formula composed of Dead Sea mineral mud that gently purifies and cleans clogged pores. Combined with an herbal complex of Aloe-Vera, Calendula Oil, Vitamin E, Sunflower Seed and Jojoba Oil.

PURE DEAD SEA MUD helps to effectively cleanse the skin and provide a soothing sensation. Rich in minerals, the pure mud aids skin renewal, creating a gentle exfoliation effect that removes excess oil, toxins, and dead skin cells for a softer feel and radiant glow.

REDUCES PORES & ABSORBS EXCESS OIL our Spa Quality Mud removes dead skin cells, dirt and toxins to reveal fresh, soft skin. Mud treatment is also known to stimulates blood microcirculation and refines texture.
OUR DEAD SEA MUD MASK is made using the Highest Quality Ingredients. It does not contain alcohol, parabens or sulfates and is Cruelty Free.

specifications.Manufacturer: NEW YORK BIOLOGY THE ULTIMATE COSMECEUTICALS
